definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
"blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
to entrust (to sb)/to place (one's hope, energy etc) in/a thing in which you invest (your hope, energy etc)

sentences.english: Leon Trotsky was assassinated near Mexico City.
sentences.chinese: 托洛斯基在墨西哥城附近遇刺。

sentences.english: Help Octo find the right answer before the missiles strike.
sentences.chinese: 帮助奥克托在导弹攻击之前找到正确的答案。

sentences.english: Oh, the wind beneath my wings.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你就是那风，托举起我的双翼。

sentences.english: The victor would win Toydaria's allegiance.
sentences.chinese: 胜利者将赢得托伊达里亚的忠诚。

sentences.english: You can trust your relatives here with your affairs.
sentences.chinese: 你的事可以托你这儿的亲戚办。

sentences.english: How Did You Get Presto TuneUp Total Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何开始普雷斯托热身共计医生？

sentences.english: Adem, how much has it helped having fellow countrymen Nemanja Vidic and Zoran at the club?
sentences.chinese: 亚当，同胞维迪奇和托西奇对你有帮助吗？

sentences.english: One woman handed me a note the teacher had sent home with her child.
sentences.chinese: 一位妇女递给我一张教师托孩子带回家的便条。

sentences.english: If you look at someone while you’re stroking your chin, they may assume that you’re making a judgmental decision about them.
sentences.chinese: 如果托着腮看人，别人可能认为你是在评判他们。

sentences.english: To get you to waste $50 on the "full" version of Presto TuneUp .
sentences.chinese: 让你浪费50元的“充分”的版本普雷斯托热身。

sentences.english: She entrusted me with her watch.
sentences.chinese: 她把她的手表托我保管。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, Trotsky's book is a provocation.
sentences.chinese: 但是托洛斯基的书是一个挑衅。

sentences.english: How do you feel about a pushup bra?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得向上托的纹胸怎样？

sentences.english: He said that a countrywoman had brought it and asked him to give it to me.
sentences.chinese: 他说是一个乡下妇女送来，托他转给我的。

sentences.english: She presents a tray with small paper cups filled with medication.
sentences.chinese: 她托着一个医护托盘，上面的小纸杯内装着药品。

sentences.english: Nancy and Tonya both work out at the same gym.
sentences.chinese: 南希和托尼亚在同一家健身房训练。

definition: to pass on to sb/to carry and give to sb else
to take care/to keep an eye on/to look after/to tell/to remind
to request sb to do sth/please!
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
to return/to give back/to send back/to repatriate
to bribe/to get (luggage) ready/to put in order/to organize things/(baseball) RBI (run batted in)
to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
if it were not for/but for
pocket/bag/to wrap up or hold in a bag/to move in a circle/to canvas or solicit/to take responsibility for/to disclose in detail/combat armor (old)
father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
